docs.summary: Provides functionality for input elements which support readonly mode.

srcDocs.summary: Provides functionality for input elements which support readonly mode.

docs.summary: Sets or gets if a user can modify the value of the input element.
description: Setting the value of the `readOnly` property to `true` prevents users
from changing the element's value. However, it does not limit your
ability to change the value programmatically. Setting it to `false`
allows users to change the element's value.
Getting the value of the `readonly` property returns whether a user
can modify the value of the input element.
You can also set an element's `readonly` property in the Editor using the Settings pane:

examples.title: Get whether the element is readOnly
Set an element to be readOnly
